"While Group B is not as open as **Group D -- a Group that looks as if any of the four teams could make it out**"
Welp, nothing to see here boys.

I had the same lines copy pasted lol and was hoping someone else had the same reaction as I did so I would not have to paste lol. #BeliefInHumanityRestored
Since when are the#1 LPL and #2 KR seeds not favorites over any NA seeds and even EU seeds (excluding FNC who are debated everywhere). 
If LGD an KTR and the heavy favorites, which they are, then how can any four of the teams make it out?!? I would have been interested in the OG vs KTR matches b/c how well OG did against FNC in the EU Finals but after losing their coach, I am not sure how, if at all, they were bothered. TSM ... have yet to fix whatever their problems are from communication, teamfighting, and generally not being on tilt the moment "M" and "S" are next to each other. If TSM Legends is anything to go by, their latest episode shows that TSM is far from challenging anyone in their group as they are right now. 

So, to say that "any of the four teams could make it out" could not possibly be more misleading.

Same. LGD will ends first with no doubt in group D, and KTR will at 90% be the 2nd team. And everybody knows that Group B is by far the more open group where FNC, AHQ and IG can all end up 1st of the group.
Moreover, saying 3 of the best teams in the tournament is in Group B seems very wrong, LGD SKT and EDG are the best three teams and they are by far better than any teams in group B. Group B have 3 good teams, but nothing like LGD SKT EDG level.
I think (and hope) he meant group A
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ

"Fnatic is really fucking good."

-Doublelift 2015
People hating on Cloud 9 like the Roman Senate hating on Ceasar {{item:3070}}

"Fnatic is really fucking good. I think they could easily make a run into the Finals. I just think they're super good. They're definitely miles ahead of the rest." RIOT used the word "fucking" reported, chat-restricted now you wont get your free summoner icon huh id dosnt feel good huh? now give me my icon
That was Doublelift. He isn't rito.
I'll report you too
C9 will win WORLDS
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ
I really wanna see C9 take their brooms to worlds

FNC 3rd? I don't agree with this at all. I understand the regional mismatch between EU and the Asian regions but AHQ above them? Fnatic's biggest strength is the coordination and cohesion between one another, their communication and shotcalling is among the best in the world and I feel this is where they will pull their biggest advantage; as team coordination is where the other teams in their group are weakest. That being said, I know IG has solid synergy, kakao works in that roster absolutely amazingly, however, FNC's bot-mid combo outclasses IG's in nearly every way, especially the bot lane. The international experience of yellow and rekkles will give them a big edge over the heavily mechanical but under experienced duo of Kid/Kitties. I believe FNC can easily get out of this group and I wouldn't be surprised to find them in the finals. rito nerf essay gg
FNC lost badly to AHQ in the MSI.

dude you forget that steelback was their adc then. with him their early game was a lot weaker because he was  (even in EU) losing lane. His strong point was his position in tf but fnatic never came to that with their weak early game. now they have rekkles who is a very stong adc so their early game wont be so bad anymore as it was at MSI

and against SKT it was 2-3 but 2 of the games they lost steelback was playing really bad and was a lot out of position so they didnt had any damage in tf . now they have rekkles who is soo strong lately. I believe that fnatic wil make it out as first or secund.

Yeah they lost to AHQ at MSI, but that was how long ago. And that was without Rekkles, who is a monster right now. This fnatic is 5 times better than MSI fnatic. I know ahq have probably improved too, but there's no way they will beat fnatic in my eyes, unless Huni goes on full tilt or something.
FNC has gotta be better than AHQ...
at msi ahq beat fnc 24 to 5 at 30 minutes and only lost two turrets
Ok... So they say IG is inconsistent but they place them over number 1 teams from Europe and Taiwan. Like what the heck is this if anything IG should be 2nd or 3rd while fnatic or ahq first
you obviously don't watch LPL. At their best IG is far superior to Fnatic. So its fair to take into consideration that when all the teams are at their best in this group, IG will take first place.
u really dont watch LPL, IG is the worst in China, EDG and LGD is much better
Did you really watch LPL? IG 3:0 EDG and 3:2 QU, tell me how is that the worst team? LMAO
that was lgd good sir, they lost 3;2 to qg in the summer semis, lost to edg 1:3 in the regional qualifier, and swept QG 3:0 in the lower bracket. The  real question is whether you watched LPL

They are assuming that iG performs at their best; flashes of which we saw against their Playoff run as well as the Gauntlet run. They are consistently inconsistent at best so you can never tell which iG is going to show up but if the top level of play they have shown, albeit seldom times, then they will run away with Group B. If anything but their best shows up, I agree that FNC and AHQ will advance over iG.
Agreed. And I think that's what the article was trying to say. iG could definitely fail to advance, but so long as they show up they'll be fine.

Makes no sense putting fnatic at 3rd. They went 2-3 against SKT at MSI and have only improved since then. There is no way ahq can keep up with skt if they played eachother. And there is only a low chance ahq will beat fnatic. I would almost put fnatic at the top. They are extremely consistent, and they've even improved their early game so much that it can't really be called an issue anymore. Yes, they were forced to 5 games against Origen, but Origen was playing out of their minds at their max potential, and still couldn't beat fnatic. Plus fnatic were thrown off by the gangplank soaz played, that's it. I bet fnatic wins this group or takes 2nd at worst.

Disclaimer: Before you call me an eu fanboy, I am actually from NA. ;)
ahq did the same
They really are hating on C9 i can tell whoever wrote this is probably a fanatic fan bc they be salty. since C9 3-0'd them last time they played
༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ C9 take my energy༼ つ ◕◕ ༽つ

These articles are very biased and uneducated. There is no way group B is the group of death. C and D easily are much harder groups to get out of considering they have the strongest teams in the tournament. You don't even have a top 4 team in group B. If anything group B is very much like group A where no one can decide on who is actually going to make it out of the group.
